  4514. 4514             $HTTPS = isset($_SERVER['HTTPS']) ? $_SERVER['HTTPS'] : (isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTPS']) ? $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTPS'] : 'off');
  4515. 4515         } elseif (isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS)) {
  4516. 4516             $SERVER_NAME = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['SERVER_NAME'];
  4517. 4517             $SERVER_PORT = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['SERVER_PORT'];
  4518. 4518             $SCRIPT_NAME = isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['PHP_SELF']) ? $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['PHP_SELF'] : $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['SCRIPT_NAME'];
  4519. 4519             $HTTPS = isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTPS']) ? $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTPS'] : 'off';
  4520. 4520         } else {
  4521. 4521             $this->setError("Neither _SERVER nor HTTP_SERVER_VARS is available");
  4522. 4522         }
  4523. 4523         // If server name has port number attached then strip it (else port number gets duplicated in WSDL output) (occurred using lighttpd and FastCGI)
  4524. 4524         $colon = strpos($SERVER_NAME,":");
  4525. 4525         if ($colon) {
  4526. 4526             $SERVER_NAME = substr($SERVER_NAME, 0, $colon);
  4527. 4527         }
  4528. 4528         if ($SERVER_PORT == 80) {
  4529. 4529             $SERVER_PORT = '';
  4530. 4530         } else {
  4531. 4531             $SERVER_PORT = ':' . $SERVER_PORT;
  4532. 4532         }
  4533. 4533         if (false == $namespace) {
  4534. 4534             $namespace = "http://$SERVER_NAME/soap/$serviceName";
  4535. 4535         }
  4536. 4536         
  4537. 4537         if (false == $endpoint) {
  4538. 4538             if ($HTTPS == '1' || $HTTPS == 'on') {
  4539. 4539                 $SCHEME = 'https';
  4540. 4540             } else {
  4541. 4541                 $SCHEME = 'http';
  4542. 4542             }
  4543. 4543             $endpoint = "$SCHEME://$SERVER_NAME$SERVER_PORT$SCRIPT_NAME";
  4544. 4544         }
  4545. 4545         
  4546. 4546         if (false == $schemaTargetNamespace) {
  4547. 4547             $schemaTargetNamespace = $namespace;
  4548. 4548         }
  4549. 4549         
  4550. 4550         $this->wsdl = new wsdl;
  4551. 4551         $this->wsdl->serviceName = $serviceName;
  4552. 4552         $this->wsdl->endpoint = $endpoint;
  4553. 4553         $this->wsdl->namespaces['tns'] = $namespace;
  4554. 4554         $this->wsdl->namespaces['soap'] = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/';
  4555. 4555         $this->wsdl->namespaces['wsdl'] = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/';
  4556. 4556         if ($schemaTargetNamespace != $namespace) {
  4557. 4557             $this->wsdl->namespaces['types'] = $schemaTargetNamespace;
  4558. 4558         }
  4559. 4559         $this->wsdl->schemas[$schemaTargetNamespace][0] = new nusoap_xmlschema('', '', $this->wsdl->namespaces);
  4560. 4560         if ($style == 'document') {
  4561. 4561             $this->wsdl->schemas[$schemaTargetNamespace][0]->schemaInfo['elementFormDefault'] = 'qualified';
  4562. 4562         }
  4563. 4563         $this->wsdl->schemas[$schemaTargetNamespace][0]->schemaTargetNamespace = $schemaTargetNamespace;
  4564. 4564         $this->wsdl->schemas[$schemaTargetNamespace][0]->imports['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/'][0] = array('location' => '', 'loaded' => true);
  4565. 4565         $this->wsdl->schemas[$schemaTargetNamespace][0]->imports['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/'][0] = array('location' => '', 'loaded' => true);
  4566. 4566         $this->wsdl->bindings[$serviceName.'Binding'] = array(
  4567. 4567             'name'=>$serviceName.'Binding',
  4568. 4568             'style'=>$style,
  4569. 4569             'transport'=>$transport,
  4570. 4570             'portType'=>$serviceName.'PortType');
  4571. 4571         $this->wsdl->ports[$serviceName.'Port'] = array(
  4572. 4572             'binding'=>$serviceName.'Binding',
  4573. 4573             'location'=>$endpoint,
  4574. 4574             'bindingType'=>'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/');
  4575. 4575     }
  4576. 4576 }
  4577. 4577 
  4578. 4578 /**
  4579. 4579  * Backward compatibility
  4580. 4580  */
  4581. 4581 class soap_server extends nusoap_server {
  4582. 4582 }
  4583. 4583 
  4584. 4584 ?><?php
  4585. 4585 
  4586. 4586 
  4587. 4587 
  4588. 4588 /**
  4589. 4589 * parses a WSDL file, allows access to it's data, other utility methods.
  4590. 4590 * also builds WSDL structures programmatically.
  4591. 4591 * 
  4592. 4592 * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
  4593. 4593 * @author   Scott Nichol <snichol@users.sourceforge.net>
  4594. 4594 * @version  $Id: nusoap.php 7541 2011-07-07 08:51:35Z gBrunier $
  4595. 4595 * @access public 
  4596. 4596 */
  4597. 4597 class wsdl extends nusoap_base {
  4598. 4598     // URL or filename of the root of this WSDL
  4599. 4599     var $wsdl; 
  4600. 4600     // define internal arrays of bindings, ports, operations, messages, etc.
  4601. 4601     var $schemas = array();
  4602. 4602     var $currentSchema;
  4603. 4603     var $message = array();
  4604. 4604     var $complexTypes = array();
  4605. 4605     var $messages = array();
  4606. 4606     var $currentMessage;
  4607. 4607     var $currentOperation;
  4608. 4608     var $portTypes = array();
  4609. 4609     var $currentPortType;
  4610. 4610     var $bindings = array();
  4611. 4611     var $currentBinding;
  4612. 4612     var $ports = array();
  4613. 4613     var $currentPort;
  4614. 4614     var $opData = array();
  4615. 4615     var $status = '';
  4616. 4616     var $documentation = false;
  4617. 4617     var $endpoint = ''; 
  4618. 4618     // array of wsdl docs to import
  4619. 4619     var $import = array(); 
  4620. 4620     // parser vars
  4621. 4621     var $parser;
  4622. 4622     var $position = 0;
  4623. 4623     var $depth = 0;
  4624. 4624     var $depth_array = array();
  4625. 4625     // for getting wsdl
  4626. 4626     var $proxyhost = '';
  4627. 4627     var $proxyport = '';
  4628. 4628     var $proxyusername = '';
  4629. 4629     var $proxypassword = '';
  4630. 4630     var $timeout = 0;
  4631. 4631     var $response_timeout = 30;
  4632. 4632     var $curl_options = array();    // User-specified cURL options
  4633. 4633     var $use_curl = false;            // whether to always try to use cURL
  4634. 4634     // for HTTP authentication
  4635. 4635     var $username = '';                // Username for HTTP authentication
  4636. 4636     var $password = '';                // Password for HTTP authentication
  4637. 4637     var $authtype = '';                // Type of HTTP authentication
  4638. 4638     var $certRequest = array();        // Certificate for HTTP SSL authentication
  4639. 4639 
  4640. 4640     /**
  4641. 4641      * constructor
  4642. 4642      * 
  4643. 4643      * @param string $wsdl WSDL document URL
  4644. 4644      * @param string $proxyhost
  4645. 4645      * @param string $proxyport
  4646. 4646      * @param string $proxyusername
  4647. 4647      * @param string $proxypassword
  4648. 4648      * @param integer $timeout set the connection timeout
  4649. 4649      * @param integer $response_timeout set the response timeout
  4650. 4650      * @param array $curl_options user-specified cURL options
  4651. 4651      * @param boolean $use_curl try to use cURL
  4652. 4652      * @access public 
  4653. 4653      */
  4654. 4654     function wsdl($wsdl = '',$proxyhost=false,$proxyport=false,$proxyusername=false,$proxypassword=false,$timeout=0,$response_timeout=30,$curl_options=null,$use_curl=false){
  4655. 4655         parent::nusoap_base();
  4656. 4656         $this->debug("ctor wsdl=$wsdl timeout=$timeout response_timeout=$response_timeout");
  4657. 4657         $this->proxyhost = $proxyhost;
  4658. 4658         $this->proxyport = $proxyport;
  4659. 4659         $this->proxyusername = $proxyusername;
  4660. 4660         $this->proxypassword = $proxypassword;
  4661. 4661         $this->timeout = $timeout;
  4662. 4662         $this->response_timeout = $response_timeout;
  4663. 4663         if (is_array($curl_options))
  4664. 4664             $this->curl_options = $curl_options;
  4665. 4665         $this->use_curl = $use_curl;
  4666. 4666         $this->fetchWSDL($wsdl);
  4667. 4667     }
  4668. 4668 
  4669. 4669     /**
  4670. 4670      * fetches the WSDL document and parses it
  4671. 4671      *
  4672. 4672      * @access public
  4673. 4673      */
  4674. 4674     function fetchWSDL($wsdl) {
  4675. 4675         $this->debug("parse and process WSDL path=$wsdl");
  4676. 4676         $this->wsdl = $wsdl;
  4677. 4677         // parse wsdl file
  4678. 4678         if ($this->wsdl != "") {
  4679. 4679             $this->parseWSDL($this->wsdl);
  4680. 4680         }
  4681. 4681         // imports
  4682. 4682         // TODO: handle imports more properly, grabbing them in-line and nesting them
  4683. 4683         $imported_urls = array();
  4684. 4684         $imported = 1;
  4685. 4685         while ($imported > 0) {
  4686. 4686             $imported = 0;
  4687. 4687             // Schema imports
  4688. 4688             foreach ($this->schemas as $ns => $list) {
  4689. 4689                 foreach ($list as $xs) {
  4690. 4690                     $wsdlparts = parse_url($this->wsdl);    // this is bogusly simple!
  4691. 4691                     foreach ($xs->imports as $ns2 => $list2) {
  4692. 4692                         for ($ii = 0; $ii < count($list2); $ii++) {
  4693. 4693                             if (! $list2[$ii]['loaded']) {
  4694. 4694                                 $this->schemas[$ns]->imports[$ns2][$ii]['loaded'] = true;
  4695. 4695                                 $url = $list2[$ii]['location'];
  4696. 4696                                 if ($url != '') {
  4697. 4697                                     $urlparts = parse_url($url);
  4698. 4698                                     if (!isset($urlparts['host'])) {
  4699. 4699                                         $url = $wsdlparts['scheme'] . '://' . $wsdlparts['host'] . (isset($wsdlparts['port']) ? ':' .$wsdlparts['port'] : '') .
  4700. 4700                                                 substr($wsdlparts['path'],0,strrpos($wsdlparts['path'],'/') + 1) .$urlparts['path'];
  4701. 4701                                     }
  4702. 4702                                     if (! in_array($url, $imported_urls)) {
  4703. 4703                                         $this->parseWSDL($url);
  4704. 4704                                         $imported++;
  4705. 4705                                         $imported_urls[] = $url;
  4706. 4706                                     }
  4707. 4707                                 } else {
  4708. 4708                                     $this->debug("Unexpected scenario: empty URL for unloaded import");
  4709. 4709                                 }
  4710. 4710                             }
  4711. 4711                         }
  4712. 4712                     } 
  4713. 4713                 }
  4714. 4714             }
  4715. 4715             // WSDL imports
  4716. 4716             $wsdlparts = parse_url($this->wsdl);    // this is bogusly simple!
  4717. 4717             foreach ($this->import as $ns => $list) {
  4718. 4718                 for ($ii = 0; $ii < count($list); $ii++) {
  4719. 4719                     if (! $list[$ii]['loaded']) {
  4720. 4720                         $this->import[$ns][$ii]['loaded'] = true;
  4721. 4721                         $url = $list[$ii]['location'];
  4722. 4722                         if ($url != '') {
  4723. 4723                             $urlparts = parse_url($url);
  4724. 4724                             if (!isset($urlparts['host'])) {
  4725. 4725                                 $url = $wsdlparts['scheme'] . '://' . $wsdlparts['host'] . (isset($wsdlparts['port']) ? ':' . $wsdlparts['port'] : '') .
  4726. 4726                                         substr($wsdlparts['path'],0,strrpos($wsdlparts['path'],'/') + 1) .$urlparts['path'];
  4727. 4727                             }
  4728. 4728                             if (! in_array($url, $imported_urls)) {
  4729. 4729                                 $this->parseWSDL($url);
  4730. 4730                                 $imported++;
  4731. 4731                                 $imported_urls[] = $url;
  4732. 4732                             }
  4733. 4733                         } else {
  4734. 4734                             $this->debug("Unexpected scenario: empty URL for unloaded import");
  4735. 4735                         }
  4736. 4736                     }
  4737. 4737                 }
  4738. 4738             } 
  4739. 4739         }
  4740. 4740         // add new data to operation data
  4741. 4741         foreach($this->bindings as $binding => $bindingData) {
  4742. 4742             if (isset($bindingData['operations']) && is_array($bindingData['operations'])) {
  4743. 4743                 foreach($bindingData['operations'] as $operation => $data) {
  4744. 4744                     $this->debug('post-parse data gathering for ' . $operation);
  4745. 4745                     $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['input'] = 
  4746. 4746                         isset($this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['input']) ? 
  4747. 4747                         array_merge($this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['input'], $this->portTypes[ $bindingData['portType'] ][$operation]['input']) :
  4748. 4748                         $this->portTypes[ $bindingData['portType'] ][$operation]['input'];
  4749. 4749                     $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['output'] = 
  4750. 4750                         isset($this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['output']) ?
  4751. 4751                         array_merge($this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['output'], $this->portTypes[ $bindingData['portType'] ][$operation]['output']) :
  4752. 4752                         $this->portTypes[ $bindingData['portType'] ][$operation]['output'];
  4753. 4753                     if (isset($this->messages[ $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['input']['message'] ])){
  4754. 4754                         $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['input']['parts'] = $this->messages[ $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['input']['message'] ];
  4755. 4755                     }
  4756. 4756                     if (isset($this->messages[ $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['output']['message'] ])){
  4757. 4757                            $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['output']['parts'] = $this->messages[ $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['output']['message'] ];
  4758. 4758                     }
  4759. 4759                     // Set operation style if necessary, but do not override one already provided
  4760. 4760                     if (isset($bindingData['style']) && !isset($this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['style'])) {
  4761. 4761                         $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['style'] = $bindingData['style'];
  4762. 4762                     }
  4763. 4763                     $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['transport'] = isset($bindingData['transport']) ? $bindingData['transport'] : '';
  4764. 4764                     $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['documentation'] = isset($this->portTypes[ $bindingData['portType'] ][$operation]['documentation']) ? $this->portTypes[ $bindingData['portType'] ][$operation]['documentation'] : '';
  4765. 4765                     $this->bindings[$binding]['operations'][$operation]['endpoint'] = isset($bindingData['endpoint']) ? $bindingData['endpoint'] : '';
  4766. 4766                 } 
  4767. 4767             } 
  4768. 4768         }
  4769. 4769     }
  4770. 4770 
  4771. 4771     /**
  4772. 4772      * parses the wsdl document
  4773. 4773      * 
  4774. 4774      * @param string $wsdl path or URL
  4775. 4775      * @access private 
  4776. 4776      */
  4777. 4777     function parseWSDL($wsdl = '') {
  4778. 4778         $this->debug("parse WSDL at path=$wsdl");
  4779. 4779 
  4780. 4780         if ($wsdl == '') {
  4781. 4781             $this->debug('no wsdl passed to parseWSDL()!!');
  4782. 4782             $this->setError('no wsdl passed to parseWSDL()!!');
  4783. 4783             return false;
  4784. 4784         }
  4785. 4785         
  4786. 4786         // parse $wsdl for url format
  4787. 4787         $wsdl_props = parse_url($wsdl);
  4788. 4788 
  4789. 4789         if (isset($wsdl_props['scheme']) && ($wsdl_props['scheme'] == 'http' || $wsdl_props['scheme'] == 'https')) {
  4790. 4790             $this->debug('getting WSDL http(s) URL ' . $wsdl);
  4791. 4791             // get wsdl
  4792. 4792             $tr = new soap_transport_http($wsdl, $this->curl_options, $this->use_curl);
  4793. 4793             $tr->request_method = 'GET';
  4794. 4794             $tr->useSOAPAction = false;
  4795. 4795             if ($this->proxyhost && $this->proxyport){
  4796. 4796                 $tr->setProxy($this->proxyhost,$this->proxyport,$this->proxyusername,$this->proxypassword);
  4797. 4797             }
  4798. 4798             if ($this->authtype != '') {
  4799. 4799                 $tr->setCredentials($this->username, $this->password, $this->authtype, array(), $this->certRequest);
  4800. 4800             }
  4801. 4801             $tr->setEncoding('gzip, deflate');
  4802. 4802             $wsdl_string = $tr->send('', $this->timeout, $this->response_timeout);
  4803. 4803             //$this->debug("WSDL request\n" . $tr->outgoing_payload);
  4804. 4804             //$this->debug("WSDL response\n" . $tr->incoming_payload);
  4805. 4805             $this->appendDebug($tr->getDebug());
  4806. 4806             // catch errors
  4807. 4807             if ($err = $tr->getError() ){
  4808. 4808                 $errstr = 'Getting ' . $wsdl . ' - HTTP ERROR: '.$err;
  4809. 4809                 $this->debug($errstr);
  4810. 4810                 $this->setError($errstr);
  4811. 4811                 unset($tr);
  4812. 4812                 return false;
  4813. 4813             }
  4814. 4814             unset($tr);
  4815. 4815             $this->debug("got WSDL URL");
  4816. 4816         } else {
  4817. 4817             // $wsdl is not http(s), so treat it as a file URL or plain file path
  4818. 4818             if (isset($wsdl_props['scheme']) && ($wsdl_props['scheme'] == 'file') && isset($wsdl_props['path'])) {
  4819. 4819                 $path = isset($wsdl_props['host']) ? ($wsdl_props['host'] . ':' . $wsdl_props['path']) : $wsdl_props['path'];
  4820. 4820             } else {
  4821. 4821                 $path = $wsdl;
  4822. 4822             }
  4823. 4823             $this->debug('getting WSDL file ' . $path);
  4824. 4824             if ($fp = @fopen($path, 'r')) {
  4825. 4825                 $wsdl_string = '';
  4826. 4826                 while ($data = fread($fp, 32768)) {
  4827. 4827                     $wsdl_string .= $data;
  4828. 4828                 } 
  4829. 4829                 fclose($fp);
  4830. 4830             } else {
  4831. 4831                 $errstr = "Bad path to WSDL file $path";
  4832. 4832                 $this->debug($errstr);
  4833. 4833                 $this->setError($errstr);
  4834. 4834                 return false;
  4835. 4835             } 
  4836. 4836         }
  4837. 4837         $this->debug('Parse WSDL');
  4838. 4838         // end new code added
  4839. 4839         // Create an XML parser.
  4840. 4840         $this->parser = xml_parser_create(); 
  4841. 4841         // Set the options for parsing the XML data.
  4842. 4842         // xml_parser_set_option($parser, XML_OPTION_SKIP_WHITE, 1);
  4843. 4843         xml_parser_set_option($this->parser, XML_OPTION_CASE_FOLDING, 0); 
  4844. 4844         // Set the object for the parser.
  4845. 4845         xml_set_object($this->parser, $this); 
  4846. 4846         // Set the element handlers for the parser.
  4847. 4847         xml_set_element_handler($this->parser, 'start_element', 'end_element');
  4848. 4848         xml_set_character_data_handler($this->parser, 'character_data');
  4849. 4849         // Parse the XML file.
  4850. 4850         if (!xml_parse($this->parser, $wsdl_string, true)) {
  4851. 4851             // Display an error message.
  4852. 4852             $errstr = sprintf(
  4853. 4853                 'XML error parsing WSDL from %s on line %d: %s',
  4854. 4854                 $wsdl,
  4855. 4855                 xml_get_current_line_number($this->parser),
  4856. 4856                 xml_error_string(xml_get_error_code($this->parser))
  4857. 4857                 );
  4858. 4858             $this->debug($errstr);
  4859. 4859             $this->debug("XML payload:\n" . $wsdl_string);
  4860. 4860             $this->setError($errstr);
  4861. 4861             return false;
  4862. 4862         } 
  4863. 4863         // free the parser
  4864. 4864         xml_parser_free($this->parser);
  4865. 4865         $this->debug('Parsing WSDL done');
  4866. 4866         // catch wsdl parse errors
  4867. 4867         if ($this->getError()){
  4868. 4868             return false;
  4869. 4869         }
  4870. 4870         return true;
  4871. 4871     } 
  4872. 4872 
  4873. 4873     /**
  4874. 4874      * start-element handler
  4875. 4875      * 
  4876. 4876      * @param string $parser XML parser object
  4877. 4877      * @param string $name element name
  4878. 4878      * @param string $attrs associative array of attributes
  4879. 4879      * @access private 
  4880. 4880      */
  4881. 4881     function start_element($parser, $name, $attrs)
  4882. 4882     {
  4883. 4883         if ($this->status == 'schema') {
  4884. 4884             $this->currentSchema->schemaStartElement($parser, $name, $attrs);
  4885. 4885             $this->appendDebug($this->currentSchema->getDebug());
  4886. 4886             $this->currentSchema->clearDebug();
  4887. 4887         } elseif (preg_match('/schema$/', $name)) {
  4888. 4888             $this->debug('Parsing WSDL schema');
  4889. 4889             // $this->debug("startElement for $name ($attrs[name]). status = $this->status (".$this->getLocalPart($name).")");
  4890. 4890             $this->status = 'schema';
  4891. 4891             $this->currentSchema = new nusoap_xmlschema('', '', $this->namespaces);
  4892. 4892             $this->currentSchema->schemaStartElement($parser, $name, $attrs);
  4893. 4893             $this->appendDebug($this->currentSchema->getDebug());
  4894. 4894             $this->currentSchema->clearDebug();
  4895. 4895         } else {
  4896. 4896             // position in the total number of elements, starting from 0
  4897. 4897             $pos = $this->position++;
  4898. 4898             $depth = $this->depth++; 
  4899. 4899             // set self as current value for this depth
  4900. 4900             $this->depth_array[$depth] = $pos;
  4901. 4901             $this->message[$pos] = array('cdata' => ''); 
  4902. 4902             // process attributes
  4903. 4903             if (count($attrs) > 0) {
  4904. 4904                 // register namespace declarations
  4905. 4905                 foreach($attrs as $k => $v) {
  4906. 4906                     if (preg_match('/^xmlns/',$k)) {
  4907. 4907                         if ($ns_prefix = substr(strrchr($k, ':'), 1)) {
  4908. 4908                             $this->namespaces[$ns_prefix] = $v;
  4909. 4909                         } else {
  4910. 4910                             $this->namespaces['ns' . (count($this->namespaces) + 1)] = $v;
  4911. 4911                         } 
  4912. 4912                         if ($v == 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' || $v == 'http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema' || $v == 'http://www.w3.org/2000/10/XMLSchema') {
  4913. 4913                             $this->XMLSchemaVersion = $v;
  4914. 4914                             $this->namespaces['xsi'] = $v . '-instance';
  4915. 4915                         } 
  4916. 4916                     }
  4917. 4917                 }
  4918. 4918                 // expand each attribute prefix to its namespace
  4919. 4919                 foreach($attrs as $k => $v) {
  4920. 4920                     $k = strpos($k, ':') ? $this->expandQname($k) : $k;
  4921. 4921                     if ($k != 'location' && $k != 'soapAction' && $k != 'namespace') {
  4922. 4922                         $v = strpos($v, ':') ? $this->expandQname($v) : $v;
  4923. 4923                     } 
  4924. 4924                     $eAttrs[$k] = $v;
  4925. 4925                 } 
  4926. 4926                 $attrs = $eAttrs;
  4927. 4927             } else {
  4928. 4928                 $attrs = array();
  4929. 4929             } 
  4930. 4930             // get element prefix, namespace and name
  4931. 4931             if (preg_match('/:/', $name)) {
  4932. 4932                 // get ns prefix
  4933. 4933                 $prefix = substr($name, 0, strpos($name, ':')); 
  4934. 4934                 // get ns
  4935. 4935                 $namespace = isset($this->namespaces[$prefix]) ? $this->namespaces[$prefix] : ''; 
  4936. 4936                 // get unqualified name
  4937. 4937                 $name = substr(strstr($name, ':'), 1);
  4938. 4938             } 
  4939. 4939             // process attributes, expanding any prefixes to namespaces
  4940. 4940             // find status, register data
  4941. 4941             switch ($this->status) {
  4942. 4942                 case 'message':
  4943. 4943                     if ($name == 'part') {
  4944. 4944                         if (isset($attrs['type'])) {
  4945. 4945                             $this->debug("msg " . $this->currentMessage . ": found part (with type) $attrs[name]: " . implode(',', $attrs));
  4946. 4946                             $this->messages[$this->currentMessage][$attrs['name']] = $attrs['type'];
  4947. 4947                         } 
  4948. 4948                         if (isset($attrs['element'])) {
  4949. 4949                             $this->debug("msg " . $this->currentMessage . ": found part (with element) $attrs[name]: " . implode(',', $attrs));
  4950. 4950                             $this->messages[$this->currentMessage][$attrs['name']] = $attrs['element'] . '^';
  4951. 4951                         } 
  4952. 4952                     } 
  4953. 4953                     break;
  4954. 4954                 case 'portType':
  4955. 4955                     switch ($name) {
  4956. 4956                         case 'operation':
  4957. 4957                             $this->currentPortOperation = $attrs['name'];
  4958. 4958                             $this->debug("portType $this->currentPortType operation: $this->currentPortOperation");
  4959. 4959                             if (isset($attrs['parameterOrder'])) {
  4960. 4960                                 $this->portTypes[$this->currentPortType][$attrs['name']]['parameterOrder'] = $attrs['parameterOrder'];
  4961. 4961                             } 
  4962. 4962                             break;
  4963. 4963                         case 'documentation':
  4964. 4964                             $this->documentation = true;
  4965. 4965                             break; 
  4966. 4966                         // merge input/output data
  4967. 4967                         default:
  4968. 4968                             $m = isset($attrs['message']) ? $this->getLocalPart($attrs['message']) : '';
  4969. 4969                             $this->portTypes[$this->currentPortType][$this->currentPortOperation][$name]['message'] = $m;
  4970. 4970                             break;
  4971. 4971                     } 
  4972. 4972                     break;
  4973. 4973                 case 'binding':
  4974. 4974                     switch ($name) {
  4975. 4975                         case 'binding': 
  4976. 4976                             // get ns prefix
  4977. 4977                             if (isset($attrs['style'])) {
  4978. 4978                             $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['prefix'] = $prefix;
  4979. 4979                             } 
  4980. 4980                             $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding] = array_merge($this->bindings[$this->currentBinding], $attrs);
  4981. 4981                             break;
  4982. 4982                         case 'header':
  4983. 4983                             $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation][$this->opStatus]['headers'][] = $attrs;
  4984. 4984                             break;
  4985. 4985                         case 'operation':
  4986. 4986                             if (isset($attrs['soapAction'])) {
  4987. 4987                                 $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation]['soapAction'] = $attrs['soapAction'];
  4988. 4988                             } 
  4989. 4989                             if (isset($attrs['style'])) {
  4990. 4990                                 $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation]['style'] = $attrs['style'];
  4991. 4991                             } 
  4992. 4992                             if (isset($attrs['name'])) {
  4993. 4993                                 $this->currentOperation = $attrs['name'];
  4994. 4994                                 $this->debug("current binding operation: $this->currentOperation");
  4995. 4995                                 $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation]['name'] = $attrs['name'];
  4996. 4996                                 $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation]['binding'] = $this->currentBinding;
  4997. 4997                                 $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation]['endpoint'] = isset($this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['endpoint']) ? $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['endpoint'] : '';
  4998. 4998                             } 
  4999. 4999                             break;
  5000. 5000                         case 'input':
  5001. 5001                             $this->opStatus = 'input';
  5002. 5002                             break;
  5003. 5003                         case 'output':
  5004. 5004                             $this->opStatus = 'output';
  5005. 5005                             break;
  5006. 5006                         case 'body':
  5007. 5007                             if (isset($this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation][$this->opStatus])) {
  5008. 5008                                 $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation][$this->opStatus] = array_merge($this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation][$this->opStatus], $attrs);
  5009. 5009                             } else {
  5010. 5010                                 $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['operations'][$this->currentOperation][$this->opStatus] = $attrs;
  5011. 5011                             } 
  5012. 5012                             break;
  5013. 5013                     } 
  5014. 5014                     break;
  5015. 5015                 case 'service':
  5016. 5016                     switch ($name) {
  5017. 5017                         case 'port':
  5018. 5018                             $this->currentPort = $attrs['name'];
  5019. 5019                             $this->debug('current port: ' . $this->currentPort);
  5020. 5020                             $this->ports[$this->currentPort]['binding'] = $this->getLocalPart($attrs['binding']);
  5021. 5021                     
  5022. 5022                             break;
  5023. 5023                         case 'address':
  5024. 5024                             $this->ports[$this->currentPort]['location'] = $attrs['location'];
  5025. 5025                             $this->ports[$this->currentPort]['bindingType'] = $namespace;
  5026. 5026                             $this->bindings[ $this->ports[$this->currentPort]['binding'] ]['bindingType'] = $namespace;
  5027. 5027                             $this->bindings[ $this->ports[$this->currentPort]['binding'] ]['endpoint'] = $attrs['location'];
  5028. 5028                             break;
  5029. 5029                     } 
  5030. 5030                     break;
  5031. 5031             } 
  5032. 5032         // set status
  5033. 5033         switch ($name) {
  5034. 5034             case 'import':
  5035. 5035                 if (isset($attrs['location'])) {
  5036. 5036                     $this->import[$attrs['namespace']][] = array('location' => $attrs['location'], 'loaded' => false);
  5037. 5037                     $this->debug('parsing import ' . $attrs['namespace']. ' - ' . $attrs['location'] . ' (' . count($this->import[$attrs['namespace']]).')');
  5038. 5038                 } else {
  5039. 5039                     $this->import[$attrs['namespace']][] = array('location' => '', 'loaded' => true);
  5040. 5040                     if (! $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($attrs['namespace'])) {
  5041. 5041                         $this->namespaces['ns'.(count($this->namespaces)+1)] = $attrs['namespace'];
  5042. 5042                     }
  5043. 5043                     $this->debug('parsing import ' . $attrs['namespace']. ' - [no location] (' . count($this->import[$attrs['namespace']]).')');
  5044. 5044                 }
  5045. 5045                 break;
  5046. 5046             //wait for schema
  5047. 5047             //case 'types':
  5048. 5048             //    $this->status = 'schema';
  5049. 5049             //    break;
  5050. 5050             case 'message':
  5051. 5051                 $this->status = 'message';
  5052. 5052                 $this->messages[$attrs['name']] = array();
  5053. 5053                 $this->currentMessage = $attrs['name'];
  5054. 5054                 break;
  5055. 5055             case 'portType':
  5056. 5056                 $this->status = 'portType';
  5057. 5057                 $this->portTypes[$attrs['name']] = array();
  5058. 5058                 $this->currentPortType = $attrs['name'];
  5059. 5059                 break;
  5060. 5060             case "binding":
  5061. 5061                 if (isset($attrs['name'])) {
  5062. 5062                 // get binding name
  5063. 5063                     if (strpos($attrs['name'], ':')) {
  5064. 5064                         $this->currentBinding = $this->getLocalPart($attrs['name']);
  5065. 5065                     } else {
  5066. 5066                         $this->currentBinding = $attrs['name'];
  5067. 5067                     } 
  5068. 5068                     $this->status = 'binding';
  5069. 5069                     $this->bindings[$this->currentBinding]['portType'] = $this->getLocalPart($attrs['type']);
  5070. 5070                     $this->debug("current binding: $this->currentBinding of portType: " . $attrs['type']);
  5071. 5071                 } 
  5072. 5072                 break;
  5073. 5073             case 'service':
  5074. 5074                 $this->serviceName = $attrs['name'];
  5075. 5075                 $this->status = 'service';
  5076. 5076                 $this->debug('current service: ' . $this->serviceName);
  5077. 5077                 break;
  5078. 5078             case 'definitions':
  5079. 5079                 foreach ($attrs as $name => $value) {
  5080. 5080                     $this->wsdl_info[$name] = $value;
  5081. 5081                 } 
  5082. 5082                 break;
  5083. 5083             } 
  5084. 5084         } 
  5085. 5085     } 
  5086. 5086 
  5087. 5087     /**
  5088. 5088     * end-element handler
  5089. 5089     * 
  5090. 5090     * @param string $parser XML parser object
  5091. 5091     * @param string $name element name
  5092. 5092     * @access private 
  5093. 5093     */
  5094. 5094     function end_element($parser, $name){ 
  5095. 5095         // unset schema status
  5096. 5096         if (/*preg_match('/types$/', $name) ||*/ preg_match('/schema$/', $name)) {
  5097. 5097             $this->status = "";
  5098. 5098             $this->appendDebug($this->currentSchema->getDebug());
  5099. 5099             $this->currentSchema->clearDebug();
  5100. 5100             $this->schemas[$this->currentSchema->schemaTargetNamespace][] = $this->currentSchema;
  5101. 5101             $this->debug('Parsing WSDL schema done');
  5102. 5102         } 
  5103. 5103         if ($this->status == 'schema') {
  5104. 5104             $this->currentSchema->schemaEndElement($parser, $name);
  5105. 5105         } else {
  5106. 5106             // bring depth down a notch
  5107. 5107             $this->depth--;
  5108. 5108         } 
  5109. 5109         // end documentation
  5110. 5110         if ($this->documentation) {
  5111. 5111             //TODO: track the node to which documentation should be assigned; it can be a part, message, etc.
  5112. 5112             //$this->portTypes[$this->currentPortType][$this->currentPortOperation]['documentation'] = $this->documentation;
  5113. 5113             $this->documentation = false;
  5114. 5114         } 
  5115. 5115     } 
  5116. 5116 
  5117. 5117     /**
  5118. 5118      * element content handler
  5119. 5119      * 
  5120. 5120      * @param string $parser XML parser object
  5121. 5121      * @param string $data element content
  5122. 5122      * @access private 
  5123. 5123      */
  5124. 5124     function character_data($parser, $data)
  5125. 5125     {
  5126. 5126         $pos = isset($this->depth_array[$this->depth]) ? $this->depth_array[$this->depth] : 0;
  5127. 5127         if (isset($this->message[$pos]['cdata'])) {
  5128. 5128             $this->message[$pos]['cdata'] .= $data;
  5129. 5129         } 
  5130. 5130         if ($this->documentation) {
  5131. 5131             $this->documentation .= $data;
  5132. 5132         } 
  5133. 5133     } 
  5134. 5134 
  5135. 5135     /**
  5136. 5136     * if authenticating, set user credentials here
  5137. 5137     *
  5138. 5138     * @param    string $username
  5139. 5139     * @param    string $password
  5140. 5140     * @param    string $authtype (basic|digest|certificate|ntlm)
  5141. 5141     * @param    array $certRequest (keys must be cainfofile (optional), sslcertfile, sslkeyfile, passphrase, certpassword (optional), verifypeer (optional), verifyhost (optional): see corresponding options in cURL docs)
  5142. 5142     * @access   public
  5143. 5143     */
  5144. 5144     function setCredentials($username, $password, $authtype = 'basic', $certRequest = array()) {
  5145. 5145         $this->debug("setCredentials username=$username authtype=$authtype certRequest=");
  5146. 5146         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($certRequest));
  5147. 5147         $this->username = $username;
  5148. 5148         $this->password = $password;
  5149. 5149         $this->authtype = $authtype;
  5150. 5150         $this->certRequest = $certRequest;
  5151. 5151     }
  5152. 5152     
  5153. 5153     function getBindingData($binding)
  5154. 5154     {
  5155. 5155         if (is_array($this->bindings[$binding])) {
  5156. 5156             return $this->bindings[$binding];
  5157. 5157         } 
  5158. 5158     }
  5159. 5159     
  5160. 5160     /**
  5161. 5161      * returns an assoc array of operation names => operation data
  5162. 5162      * 
  5163. 5163      * @param string $portName WSDL port name
  5164. 5164      * @param string $bindingType eg: soap, smtp, dime (only soap and soap12 are currently supported)
  5165. 5165      * @return array 
  5166. 5166      * @access public 
  5167. 5167      */
  5168. 5168     function getOperations($portName = '', $bindingType = 'soap') {
  5169. 5169         $ops = array();
  5170. 5170         if ($bindingType == 'soap') {
  5171. 5171             $bindingType = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/';
  5172. 5172         } elseif ($bindingType == 'soap12') {
  5173. 5173             $bindingType = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/';
  5174. 5174         } else {
  5175. 5175             $this->debug("getOperations bindingType $bindingType may not be supported");
  5176. 5176         }
  5177. 5177         $this->debug("getOperations for port '$portName' bindingType $bindingType");
  5178. 5178         // loop thru ports
  5179. 5179         foreach($this->ports as $port => $portData) {
  5180. 5180             $this->debug("getOperations checking port $port bindingType " . $portData['bindingType']);
  5181. 5181             if ($portName == '' || $port == $portName) {
  5182. 5182                 // binding type of port matches parameter
  5183. 5183                 if ($portData['bindingType'] == $bindingType) {
  5184. 5184                     $this->debug("getOperations found port $port bindingType $bindingType");
  5185. 5185                     //$this->debug("port data: " . $this->varDump($portData));
  5186. 5186                     //$this->debug("bindings: " . $this->varDump($this->bindings[ $portData['binding'] ]));
  5187. 5187                     // merge bindings
  5188. 5188                     if (isset($this->bindings[ $portData['binding'] ]['operations'])) {
  5189. 5189                         $ops = array_merge ($ops, $this->bindings[ $portData['binding'] ]['operations']);
  5190. 5190                     }
  5191. 5191                 }
  5192. 5192             }
  5193. 5193         }
  5194. 5194         if (count($ops) == 0) {
  5195. 5195             $this->debug("getOperations found no operations for port '$portName' bindingType $bindingType");
  5196. 5196         }
  5197. 5197         return $ops;
  5198. 5198     } 
  5199. 5199     
  5200. 5200     /**
  5201. 5201      * returns an associative array of data necessary for calling an operation
  5202. 5202      * 
  5203. 5203      * @param string $operation name of operation
  5204. 5204      * @param string $bindingType type of binding eg: soap, soap12
  5205. 5205      * @return array 
  5206. 5206      * @access public 
  5207. 5207      */
  5208. 5208     function getOperationData($operation, $bindingType = 'soap')
  5209. 5209     {
  5210. 5210         if ($bindingType == 'soap') {
  5211. 5211             $bindingType = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/';
  5212. 5212         } elseif ($bindingType == 'soap12') {
  5213. 5213             $bindingType = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/';
  5214. 5214         }
  5215. 5215         // loop thru ports
  5216. 5216         foreach($this->ports as $port => $portData) {
  5217. 5217             // binding type of port matches parameter
  5218. 5218             if ($portData['bindingType'] == $bindingType) {
  5219. 5219                 // get binding
  5220. 5220                 //foreach($this->bindings[ $portData['binding'] ]['operations'] as $bOperation => $opData) {
  5221. 5221                 foreach(array_keys($this->bindings[ $portData['binding'] ]['operations']) as $bOperation) {
  5222. 5222                     // note that we could/should also check the namespace here
  5223. 5223                     if ($operation == $bOperation) {
  5224. 5224                         $opData = $this->bindings[ $portData['binding'] ]['operations'][$operation];
  5225. 5225                         return $opData;
  5226. 5226                     } 
  5227. 5227                 } 
  5228. 5228             }
  5229. 5229         } 
  5230. 5230     }
  5231. 5231     
  5232. 5232     /**
  5233. 5233      * returns an associative array of data necessary for calling an operation
  5234. 5234      * 
  5235. 5235      * @param string $soapAction soapAction for operation
  5236. 5236      * @param string $bindingType type of binding eg: soap, soap12
  5237. 5237      * @return array 
  5238. 5238      * @access public 
  5239. 5239      */
  5240. 5240     function getOperationDataForSoapAction($soapAction, $bindingType = 'soap') {
  5241. 5241         if ($bindingType == 'soap') {
  5242. 5242             $bindingType = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/';
  5243. 5243         } elseif ($bindingType == 'soap12') {
  5244. 5244             $bindingType = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/';
  5245. 5245         }
  5246. 5246         // loop thru ports
  5247. 5247         foreach($this->ports as $port => $portData) {
  5248. 5248             // binding type of port matches parameter
  5249. 5249             if ($portData['bindingType'] == $bindingType) {
  5250. 5250                 // loop through operations for the binding
  5251. 5251                 foreach ($this->bindings[ $portData['binding'] ]['operations'] as $bOperation => $opData) {
  5252. 5252                     if ($opData['soapAction'] == $soapAction) {
  5253. 5253                         return $opData;
  5254. 5254                     } 
  5255. 5255                 } 
  5256. 5256             }
  5257. 5257         } 
  5258. 5258     }
  5259. 5259     
  5260. 5260     /**
  5261. 5261     * returns an array of information about a given type
  5262. 5262     * returns false if no type exists by the given name
  5263. 5263     *
  5264. 5264     *     typeDef = array(
  5265. 5265     *     'elements' => array(), // refs to elements array
  5266. 5266     *    'restrictionBase' => '',
  5267. 5267     *    'phpType' => '',
  5268. 5268     *    'order' => '(sequence|all)',
  5269. 5269     *    'attrs' => array() // refs to attributes array
  5270. 5270     *    )
  5271. 5271     *
  5272. 5272     * @param string $type the type
  5273. 5273     * @param string $ns namespace (not prefix) of the type
  5274. 5274     * @return mixed
  5275. 5275     * @access public
  5276. 5276     * @see nusoap_xmlschema
  5277. 5277     */
  5278. 5278     function getTypeDef($type, $ns) {
  5279. 5279         $this->debug("in getTypeDef: type=$type, ns=$ns");
  5280. 5280         if ((! $ns) && isset($this->namespaces['tns'])) {
  5281. 5281             $ns = $this->namespaces['tns'];
  5282. 5282             $this->debug("in getTypeDef: type namespace forced to $ns");
  5283. 5283         }
  5284. 5284         if (!isset($this->schemas[$ns])) {
  5285. 5285             foreach ($this->schemas as $ns0 => $schema0) {
  5286. 5286                 if (strcasecmp($ns, $ns0) == 0) {
  5287. 5287                     $this->debug("in getTypeDef: replacing schema namespace $ns with $ns0");
  5288. 5288                     $ns = $ns0;
  5289. 5289                     break;
  5290. 5290                 }
  5291. 5291             }
  5292. 5292         }
  5293. 5293         if (isset($this->schemas[$ns])) {
  5294. 5294             $this->debug("in getTypeDef: have schema for namespace $ns");
  5295. 5295             for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->schemas[$ns]); $i++) {
  5296. 5296                 $xs = &$this->schemas[$ns][$i];
  5297. 5297                 $t = $xs->getTypeDef($type);
  5298. 5298                 $this->appendDebug($xs->getDebug());
  5299. 5299                 $xs->clearDebug();
  5300. 5300                 if ($t) {
  5301. 5301                     $this->debug("in getTypeDef: found type $type");
  5302. 5302                     if (!isset($t['phpType'])) {
  5303. 5303                         // get info for type to tack onto the element
  5304. 5304                         $uqType = substr($t['type'], strrpos($t['type'], ':') + 1);
  5305. 5305                         $ns = substr($t['type'], 0, strrpos($t['type'], ':'));
  5306. 5306                         $etype = $this->getTypeDef($uqType, $ns);
  5307. 5307                         if ($etype) {
  5308. 5308                             $this->debug("found type for [element] $type:");
  5309. 5309                             $this->debug($this->varDump($etype));
  5310. 5310                             if (isset($etype['phpType'])) {
  5311. 5311                                 $t['phpType'] = $etype['phpType'];
  5312. 5312                             }
  5313. 5313                             if (isset($etype['elements'])) {
  5314. 5314                                 $t['elements'] = $etype['elements'];
  5315. 5315                             }
  5316. 5316                             if (isset($etype['attrs'])) {
  5317. 5317                                 $t['attrs'] = $etype['attrs'];
  5318. 5318                             }
  5319. 5319                         } else {
  5320. 5320                             $this->debug("did not find type for [element] $type");
  5321. 5321                         }
  5322. 5322                     }
  5323. 5323                     return $t;
  5324. 5324                 }
  5325. 5325             }
  5326. 5326             $this->debug("in getTypeDef: did not find type $type");
  5327. 5327         } else {
  5328. 5328             $this->debug("in getTypeDef: do not have schema for namespace $ns");
  5329. 5329         }
  5330. 5330         return false;
  5331. 5331     }
  5332. 5332 
  5333. 5333     /**
  5334. 5334     * prints html description of services
  5335. 5335     *
  5336. 5336     * @access private
  5337. 5337     */
  5338. 5338     function webDescription(){
  5339. 5339         global $HTTP_SERVER_VARS;
  5340. 5340 
  5341. 5341         if (isset($_SERVER)) {
  5342. 5342             $PHP_SELF = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
  5343. 5343         } elseif (isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS)) {
  5344. 5344             $PHP_SELF = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['PHP_SELF'];
  5345. 5345         } else {
  5346. 5346             $this->setError("Neither _SERVER nor HTTP_SERVER_VARS is available");
  5347. 5347         }
  5348. 5348 
  5349. 5349         $b = '
  5350. 5350         <html><head><title>NuSOAP: '.$this->serviceName.'</title>
  5351. 5351         <style type="text/css">
  5352. 5352             body    { font-family: arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px; }
  5353. 5353             p       { font-family: arial; color: #000000; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 12px; }
  5354. 5354             pre { background-color: silver; padding: 5px; font-family: Courier New; font-size: x-small; color: #000000;}
  5355. 5355             ul      { margin-top: 10px; margin-left: 20px; }
  5356. 5356             li      { list-style-type: none; margin-top: 10px; color: #000000; }
  5357. 5357             .content{
  5358. 5358             margin-left: 0px; padding-bottom: 2em; }
  5359. 5359             .nav {
  5360. 5360             padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 15px; font-size: .70em;
  5361. 5361             margin-top: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: #000000;
  5362. 5362             background-color: #ccccff; width: 20%; margin-left: 20px; margin-top: 20px; }
  5363. 5363             .title {
  5364. 5364             font-family: arial; font-size: 26px; color: #ffffff;
  5365. 5365             background-color: #999999; width: 100%;
  5366. 5366             margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px;
  5367. 5367             padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px;}
  5368. 5368             .hidden {
  5369. 5369             position: absolute; visibility: hidden; z-index: 200; left: 250px; top: 100px;
  5370. 5370             font-family: arial; overflow: hidden; width: 600;
  5371. 5371             padding: 20px; font-size: 10px; background-color: #999999;
  5372. 5372             layer-background-color:#FFFFFF; }
  5373. 5373             a,a:active  { color: charcoal; font-weight: bold; }
  5374. 5374             a:visited   { color: #666666; font-weight: bold; }
  5375. 5375             a:hover     { color: cc3300; font-weight: bold; }
  5376. 5376         </style>
  5377. 5377         <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
  5378. 5378         <!--
  5379. 5379         // POP-UP CAPTIONS...
  5380. 5380         function lib_bwcheck(){ //Browsercheck (needed)
  5381. 5381             this.ver=navigator.appVersion
  5382. 5382             this.agent=navigator.userAgent
  5383. 5383             this.dom=document.getElementById?1:0
  5384. 5384             this.opera5=this.agent.indexOf("Opera 5")>-1
  5385. 5385             this.ie5=(this.ver.indexOf("MSIE 5")>-1 && this.dom && !this.opera5)?1:0;
  5386. 5386             this.ie6=(this.ver.indexOf("MSIE 6")>-1 && this.dom && !this.opera5)?1:0;
  5387. 5387             this.ie4=(document.all && !this.dom && !this.opera5)?1:0;
  5388. 5388             this.ie=this.ie4||this.ie5||this.ie6
  5389. 5389             this.mac=this.agent.indexOf("Mac")>-1
  5390. 5390             this.ns6=(this.dom && parseInt(this.ver) >= 5) ?1:0;
  5391. 5391             this.ns4=(document.layers && !this.dom)?1:0;
  5392. 5392             this.bw=(this.ie6 || this.ie5 || this.ie4 || this.ns4 || this.ns6 || this.opera5)
  5393. 5393             return this
  5394. 5394         }
  5395. 5395         var bw = new lib_bwcheck()
  5396. 5396         //Makes crossbrowser object.
  5397. 5397         function makeObj(obj){
  5398. 5398             this.evnt=bw.dom? document.getElementById(obj):bw.ie4?document.all[obj]:bw.ns4?document.layers[obj]:0;
  5399. 5399             if (!this.evnt) return false
  5400. 5400             this.css=bw.dom||bw.ie4?this.evnt.style:bw.ns4?this.evnt:0;
  5401. 5401             this.wref=bw.dom||bw.ie4?this.evnt:bw.ns4?this.css.document:0;
  5402. 5402             this.writeIt=b_writeIt;
  5403. 5403             return this
  5404. 5404         }
  5405. 5405         // A unit of measure that will be added when setting the position of a layer.
  5406. 5406         //var px = bw.ns4||window.opera?"":"px";
  5407. 5407         function b_writeIt(text){
  5408. 5408             if (bw.ns4){this.wref.write(text);this.wref.close()}
  5409. 5409             else this.wref.innerHTML = text
  5410. 5410         }
  5411. 5411         //Shows the messages
  5412. 5412         var oDesc;
  5413. 5413         function popup(divid){
  5414. 5414             if (oDesc = new makeObj(divid)){
  5415. 5415             oDesc.css.visibility = "visible"
  5416. 5416             }
  5417. 5417         }
  5418. 5418         function popout(){ // Hides message
  5419. 5419             if (oDesc) oDesc.css.visibility = "hidden"
  5420. 5420         }
  5421. 5421         //-->
  5422. 5422         </script>
  5423. 5423         </head>
  5424. 5424         <body>
  5425. 5425         <div class=content>
  5426. 5426             <br><br>
  5427. 5427             <div class=title>'.$this->serviceName.'</div>
  5428. 5428             <div class=nav>
  5429. 5429                 <p>View the <a href="'.$PHP_SELF.'?wsdl">WSDL</a> for the service.
  5430. 5430                 Click on an operation name to view it&apos;s details.</p>
  5431. 5431                 <ul>';
  5432. 5432                 foreach($this->getOperations() as $op => $data){
  5433. 5433                     $b .= "<li><a href='#' onclick=\"popout();popup('$op')\">$op</a></li>";
  5434. 5434                     // create hidden div
  5435. 5435                     $b .= "<div id='$op' class='hidden'>
  5436. 5436                     <a href='#' onclick='popout()'><font color='#ffffff'>Close</font></a><br><br>";
  5437. 5437                     foreach($data as $donnie => $marie){ // loop through opdata
  5438. 5438                         if ($donnie == 'input' || $donnie == 'output'){ // show input/output data
  5439. 5439                             $b .= "<font color='white'>".ucfirst($donnie).':</font><br>';
  5440. 5440                             foreach($marie as $captain => $tenille){ // loop through data
  5441. 5441                                 if ($captain == 'parts'){ // loop thru parts
  5442. 5442                                     $b .= "&nbsp;&nbsp;$captain:<br>";
  5443. 5443                                     //if (is_array($tenille)){
  5444. 5444                                         foreach($tenille as $joanie => $chachi){
  5445. 5445                                             $b .= "&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$joanie: $chachi<br>";
  5446. 5446                                         }
  5447. 5447                                     //}
  5448. 5448                                 } else {
  5449. 5449                                     $b .= "&nbsp;&nbsp;$captain: $tenille<br>";
  5450. 5450                                 }
  5451. 5451                             }
  5452. 5452                         } else {
  5453. 5453                             $b .= "<font color='white'>".ucfirst($donnie).":</font> $marie<br>";
  5454. 5454                         }
  5455. 5455                     }
  5456. 5456                     $b .= '</div>';
  5457. 5457                 }
  5458. 5458                 $b .= '
  5459. 5459                 <ul>
  5460. 5460             </div>
  5461. 5461         </div></body></html>';
  5462. 5462         return $b;
  5463. 5463     }
  5464. 5464 
  5465. 5465     /**
  5466. 5466     * serialize the parsed wsdl
  5467. 5467     *
  5468. 5468     * @param mixed $debug whether to put debug=1 in endpoint URL
  5469. 5469     * @return string serialization of WSDL
  5470. 5470     * @access public 
  5471. 5471     */
  5472. 5472     function serialize($debug = 0)
  5473. 5473     {
  5474. 5474         $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>';
  5475. 5475         $xml .= "\n<definitions";
  5476. 5476         foreach($this->namespaces as $k => $v) {
  5477. 5477             $xml .= " xmlns:$k=\"$v\"";
  5478. 5478         } 
  5479. 5479         // 10.9.02 - add poulter fix for wsdl and tns declarations
  5480. 5480         if (isset($this->namespaces['wsdl'])) {
  5481. 5481             $xml .= " xmlns=\"" . $this->namespaces['wsdl'] . "\"";
  5482. 5482         } 
  5483. 5483         if (isset($this->namespaces['tns'])) {
  5484. 5484             $xml .= " targetNamespace=\"" . $this->namespaces['tns'] . "\"";
  5485. 5485         } 
  5486. 5486         $xml .= '>'; 
  5487. 5487         // imports
  5488. 5488         if (sizeof($this->import) > 0) {
  5489. 5489             foreach($this->import as $ns => $list) {
  5490. 5490                 foreach ($list as $ii) {
  5491. 5491                     if ($ii['location'] != '') {
  5492. 5492                         $xml .= '<import location="' . $ii['location'] . '" namespace="' . $ns . '" />';
  5493. 5493                     } else {
  5494. 5494                         $xml .= '<import namespace="' . $ns . '" />';
  5495. 5495                     }
  5496. 5496                 }
  5497. 5497             } 
  5498. 5498         } 
  5499. 5499         // types
  5500. 5500         if (count($this->schemas)>=1) {
  5501. 5501             $xml .= "\n<types>\n";
  5502. 5502             foreach ($this->schemas as $ns => $list) {
  5503. 5503                 foreach ($list as $xs) {
  5504. 5504                     $xml .= $xs->serializeSchema();
  5505. 5505                 }
  5506. 5506             }
  5507. 5507             $xml .= '</types>';
  5508. 5508         } 
  5509. 5509         // messages
  5510. 5510         if (count($this->messages) >= 1) {
  5511. 5511             foreach($this->messages as $msgName => $msgParts) {
  5512. 5512                 $xml .= "\n<message name=\"" . $msgName . '">';
  5513. 5513                 if (is_array($msgParts)){
  5514. 5514                     foreach($msgParts as $partName => $partType) {
  5515. 5515                         // print 'serializing '.$partType.', sv: '.$this->XMLSchemaVersion.'<br>';
  5516. 5516                         if (strpos($partType, ':')) {
  5517. 5517                             $typePrefix = $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($this->getPrefix($partType));
  5518. 5518                         } elseif (isset($this->typemap[$this->namespaces['xsd']][$partType])) {
  5519. 5519                             // print 'checking typemap: '.$this->XMLSchemaVersion.'<br>';
  5520. 5520                             $typePrefix = 'xsd';
  5521. 5521                         } else {
  5522. 5522                             foreach($this->typemap as $ns => $types) {
  5523. 5523                                 if (isset($types[$partType])) {
  5524. 5524                                     $typePrefix = $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns);
  5525. 5525                                 } 
  5526. 5526                             } 
  5527. 5527                             if (!isset($typePrefix)) {
  5528. 5528                                 die("$partType has no namespace!");
  5529. 5529                             } 
  5530. 5530                         }
  5531. 5531                         $ns = $this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($typePrefix);
  5532. 5532                         $localPart = $this->getLocalPart($partType);
  5533. 5533                         $typeDef = $this->getTypeDef($localPart, $ns);
  5534. 5534                         if ($typeDef['typeClass'] == 'element') {
  5535. 5535                             $elementortype = 'element';
  5536. 5536                             if (substr($localPart, -1) == '^') {
  5537. 5537                                 $localPart = substr($localPart, 0, -1);
  5538. 5538                             }
  5539. 5539                         } else {
  5540. 5540                             $elementortype = 'type';
  5541. 5541                         }
  5542. 5542                         $xml .= "\n" . '  <part name="' . $partName . '" ' . $elementortype . '="' . $typePrefix . ':' . $localPart . '" />';
  5543. 5543                     }
  5544. 5544                 }
  5545. 5545                 $xml .= '</message>';
  5546. 5546             } 
  5547. 5547         } 
  5548. 5548         // bindings & porttypes
  5549. 5549         if (count($this->bindings) >= 1) {
  5550. 5550             $binding_xml = '';
  5551. 5551             $portType_xml = '';
  5552. 5552             foreach($this->bindings as $bindingName => $attrs) {
  5553. 5553                 $binding_xml .= "\n<binding name=\"" . $bindingName . '" type="tns:' . $attrs['portType'] . '">';
  5554. 5554                 $binding_xml .= "\n" . '  <soap:binding style="' . $attrs['style'] . '" transport="' . $attrs['transport'] . '"/>';
  5555. 5555                 $portType_xml .= "\n<portType name=\"" . $attrs['portType'] . '">';
  5556. 5556                 foreach($attrs['operations'] as $opName => $opParts) {
  5557. 5557                     $binding_xml .= "\n" . '  <operation name="' . $opName . '">';
  5558. 5558                     $binding_xml .= "\n" . '    <soap:operation soapAction="' . $opParts['soapAction'] . '" style="'. $opParts['style'] . '"/>';
  5559. 5559                     if (isset($opParts['input']['encodingStyle']) && $opParts['input']['encodingStyle'] != '') {
  5560. 5560                         $enc_style = ' encodingStyle="' . $opParts['input']['encodingStyle'] . '"';
  5561. 5561                     } else {
  5562. 5562                         $enc_style = '';
  5563. 5563                     }
  5564. 5564                     $binding_xml .= "\n" . '    <input><soap:body use="' . $opParts['input']['use'] . '" namespace="' . $opParts['input']['namespace'] . '"' . $enc_style . '/></input>';
  5565. 5565                     if (isset($opParts['output']['encodingStyle']) && $opParts['output']['encodingStyle'] != '') {
  5566. 5566                         $enc_style = ' encodingStyle="' . $opParts['output']['encodingStyle'] . '"';
  5567. 5567                     } else {
  5568. 5568                         $enc_style = '';
  5569. 5569                     }
  5570. 5570                     $binding_xml .= "\n" . '    <output><soap:body use="' . $opParts['output']['use'] . '" namespace="' . $opParts['output']['namespace'] . '"' . $enc_style . '/></output>';
  5571. 5571                     $binding_xml .= "\n" . '  </operation>';
  5572. 5572                     $portType_xml .= "\n" . '  <operation name="' . $opParts['name'] . '"';
  5573. 5573                     if (isset($opParts['parameterOrder'])) {
  5574. 5574                         $portType_xml .= ' parameterOrder="' . $opParts['parameterOrder'] . '"';
  5575. 5575                     } 
  5576. 5576                     $portType_xml .= '>';
  5577. 5577                     if (isset($opParts['documentation']) && $opParts['documentation'] != '') {
  5578. 5578                         $portType_xml .= "\n" . '    <documentation>' . htmlspecialchars($opParts['documentation']) . '</documentation>';
  5579. 5579                     }
  5580. 5580                     $portType_xml .= "\n" . '    <input message="tns:' . $opParts['input']['message'] . '"/>';
  5581. 5581                     $portType_xml .= "\n" . '    <output message="tns:' . $opParts['output']['message'] . '"/>';
  5582. 5582                     $portType_xml .= "\n" . '  </operation>';
  5583. 5583                 } 
  5584. 5584                 $portType_xml .= "\n" . '</portType>';
  5585. 5585                 $binding_xml .= "\n" . '</binding>';
  5586. 5586             } 
  5587. 5587             $xml .= $portType_xml . $binding_xml;
  5588. 5588         } 
  5589. 5589         // services
  5590. 5590         $xml .= "\n<service name=\"" . $this->serviceName . '">';
  5591. 5591         if (count($this->ports) >= 1) {
  5592. 5592             foreach($this->ports as $pName => $attrs) {
  5593. 5593                 $xml .= "\n" . '  <port name="' . $pName . '" binding="tns:' . $attrs['binding'] . '">';
  5594. 5594                 $xml .= "\n" . '    <soap:address location="' . $attrs['location'] . ($debug ? '?debug=1' : '') . '"/>';
  5595. 5595                 $xml .= "\n" . '  </port>';
  5596. 5596             } 
  5597. 5597         } 
  5598. 5598         $xml .= "\n" . '</service>';
  5599. 5599         return $xml . "\n</definitions>";
  5600. 5600     } 
  5601. 5601 
  5602. 5602     /**
  5603. 5603      * determine whether a set of parameters are unwrapped
  5604. 5604      * when they are expect to be wrapped, Microsoft-style.
  5605. 5605      *
  5606. 5606      * @param string $type the type (element name) of the wrapper
  5607. 5607      * @param array $parameters the parameter values for the SOAP call
  5608. 5608      * @return boolean whether they parameters are unwrapped (and should be wrapped)
  5609. 5609      * @access private
  5610. 5610      */
  5611. 5611     function parametersMatchWrapped($type, &$parameters) {
  5612. 5612         $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped type=$type, parameters=");
  5613. 5613         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($parameters));
  5614. 5614 
  5615. 5615         // split type into namespace:unqualified-type
  5616. 5616         if (strpos($type, ':')) {
  5617. 5617             $uqType = substr($type, strrpos($type, ':') + 1);
  5618. 5618             $ns = substr($type, 0, strrpos($type, ':'));
  5619. 5619             $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: got a prefixed type: $uqType, $ns");
  5620. 5620             if ($this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($ns)) {
  5621. 5621                 $ns = $this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($ns);
  5622. 5622                 $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: expanded prefixed type: $uqType, $ns");
  5623. 5623             }
  5624. 5624         } else {
  5625. 5625             // TODO: should the type be compared to types in XSD, and the namespace
  5626. 5626             // set to XSD if the type matches?
  5627. 5627             $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: No namespace for type $type");
  5628. 5628             $ns = '';
  5629. 5629             $uqType = $type;
  5630. 5630         }
  5631. 5631 
  5632. 5632         // get the type information
  5633. 5633         if (!$typeDef = $this->getTypeDef($uqType, $ns)) {
  5634. 5634             $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: $type ($uqType) is not a supported type.");
  5635. 5635             return false;
  5636. 5636         }
  5637. 5637         $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: found typeDef=");
  5638. 5638         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($typeDef));
  5639. 5639         if (substr($uqType, -1) == '^') {
  5640. 5640             $uqType = substr($uqType, 0, -1);
  5641. 5641         }
  5642. 5642         $phpType = $typeDef['phpType'];
  5643. 5643         $arrayType = (isset($typeDef['arrayType']) ? $typeDef['arrayType'] : '');
  5644. 5644         $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: uqType: $uqType, ns: $ns, phptype: $phpType, arrayType: $arrayType");
  5645. 5645         
  5646. 5646         // we expect a complexType or element of complexType
  5647. 5647         if ($phpType != 'struct') {
  5648. 5648             $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: not a struct");
  5649. 5649             return false;
  5650. 5650         }
  5651. 5651 
  5652. 5652         // see whether the parameter names match the elements
  5653. 5653         if (isset($typeDef['elements']) && is_array($typeDef['elements'])) {
  5654. 5654             $elements = 0;
  5655. 5655             $matches = 0;
  5656. 5656             foreach ($typeDef['elements'] as $name => $attrs) {
  5657. 5657                 if (isset($parameters[$name])) {
  5658. 5658                     $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: have parameter named $name");
  5659. 5659                     $matches++;
  5660. 5660                 } else {
  5661. 5661                     $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: do not have parameter named $name");
  5662. 5662                 }
  5663. 5663                 $elements++;
  5664. 5664             }
  5665. 5665 
  5666. 5666             $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: $matches parameter names match $elements wrapped parameter names");
  5667. 5667             if ($matches == 0) {
  5668. 5668                 return false;
  5669. 5669             }
  5670. 5670             return true;
  5671. 5671         }
  5672. 5672 
  5673. 5673         // since there are no elements for the type, if the user passed no
  5674. 5674         // parameters, the parameters match wrapped.
  5675. 5675         $this->debug("in parametersMatchWrapped: no elements type $ns:$uqType");
  5676. 5676         return count($parameters) == 0;
  5677. 5677     }
  5678. 5678 
  5679. 5679     /**
  5680. 5680      * serialize PHP values according to a WSDL message definition
  5681. 5681      * contrary to the method name, this is not limited to RPC
  5682. 5682      *
  5683. 5683      * TODO
  5684. 5684      * - multi-ref serialization
  5685. 5685      * - validate PHP values against type definitions, return errors if invalid
  5686. 5686      * 
  5687. 5687      * @param string $operation operation name
  5688. 5688      * @param string $direction (input|output)
  5689. 5689      * @param mixed $parameters parameter value(s)
  5690. 5690      * @param string $bindingType (soap|soap12)
  5691. 5691      * @return mixed parameters serialized as XML or false on error (e.g. operation not found)
  5692. 5692      * @access public
  5693. 5693      */
  5694. 5694     function serializeRPCParameters($operation, $direction, $parameters, $bindingType = 'soap') {
  5695. 5695         $this->debug("in serializeRPCParameters: operation=$operation, direction=$direction, XMLSchemaVersion=$this->XMLSchemaVersion, bindingType=$bindingType");
  5696. 5696         $this->appendDebug('parameters=' . $this->varDump($parameters));
  5697. 5697         
  5698. 5698         if ($direction != 'input' && $direction != 'output') {
  5699. 5699             $this->debug('The value of the \$direction argument needs to be either "input" or "output"');
  5700. 5700             $this->setError('The value of the \$direction argument needs to be either "input" or "output"');
  5701. 5701             return false;
  5702. 5702         } 
  5703. 5703         if (!$opData = $this->getOperationData($operation, $bindingType)) {
  5704. 5704             $this->debug('Unable to retrieve WSDL data for operation: ' . $operation . ' bindingType: ' . $bindingType);
  5705. 5705             $this->setError('Unable to retrieve WSDL data for operation: ' . $operation . ' bindingType: ' . $bindingType);
  5706. 5706             return false;
  5707. 5707         }
  5708. 5708         $this->debug('in serializeRPCParameters: opData:');
  5709. 5709         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($opData));
  5710. 5710 
  5711. 5711         // Get encoding style for output and set to current
  5712. 5712         $encodingStyle = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/';
  5713. 5713         if (($direction == 'input') && isset($opData['output']['encodingStyle']) && ($opData['output']['encodingStyle'] != $encodingStyle)) {
  5714. 5714             $encodingStyle = $opData['output']['encodingStyle'];
  5715. 5715             $enc_style = $encodingStyle;
  5716. 5716         }
  5717. 5717 
  5718. 5718         // set input params
  5719. 5719         $xml = '';
  5720. 5720         if (isset($opData[$direction]['parts']) && sizeof($opData[$direction]['parts']) > 0) {
  5721. 5721             $parts = &$opData[$direction]['parts'];
  5722. 5722             $part_count = sizeof($parts);
  5723. 5723             $style = $opData['style'];
  5724. 5724             $use = $opData[$direction]['use'];
  5725. 5725             $this->debug("have $part_count part(s) to serialize using $style/$use");
  5726. 5726             if (is_array($parameters)) {
  5727. 5727                 $parametersArrayType = $this->isArraySimpleOrStruct($parameters);
  5728. 5728                 $parameter_count = count($parameters);
  5729. 5729                 $this->debug("have $parameter_count parameter(s) provided as $parametersArrayType to serialize");
  5730. 5730                 // check for Microsoft-style wrapped parameters
  5731. 5731                 if ($style == 'document' && $use == 'literal' && $part_count == 1 && isset($parts['parameters'])) {
  5732. 5732                     $this->debug('check whether the caller has wrapped the parameters');
  5733. 5733                     if ($direction == 'output' && $parametersArrayType == 'arraySimple' && $parameter_count == 1) {
  5734. 5734                         // TODO: consider checking here for double-wrapping, when
  5735. 5735                         // service function wraps, then NuSOAP wraps again
  5736. 5736                         $this->debug("change simple array to associative with 'parameters' element");
  5737. 5737                         $parameters['parameters'] = $parameters[0];
  5738. 5738                         unset($parameters[0]);
  5739. 5739                     }
  5740. 5740                     if (($parametersArrayType == 'arrayStruct' || $parameter_count == 0) && !isset($parameters['parameters'])) {
  5741. 5741                         $this->debug('check whether caller\'s parameters match the wrapped ones');
  5742. 5742                         if ($this->parametersMatchWrapped($parts['parameters'], $parameters)) {
  5743. 5743                             $this->debug('wrap the parameters for the caller');
  5744. 5744                             $parameters = array('parameters' => $parameters);
  5745. 5745                             $parameter_count = 1;
  5746. 5746                         }
  5747. 5747                     }
  5748. 5748                 }
  5749. 5749                 foreach ($parts as $name => $type) {
  5750. 5750                     $this->debug("serializing part $name of type $type");
  5751. 5751                     // Track encoding style
  5752. 5752                     if (isset($opData[$direction]['encodingStyle']) && $encodingStyle != $opData[$direction]['encodingStyle']) {
  5753. 5753                         $encodingStyle = $opData[$direction]['encodingStyle'];            
  5754. 5754                         $enc_style = $encodingStyle;
  5755. 5755                     } else {
  5756. 5756                         $enc_style = false;
  5757. 5757                     }
  5758. 5758                     // NOTE: add error handling here
  5759. 5759                     // if serializeType returns false, then catch global error and fault
  5760. 5760                     if ($parametersArrayType == 'arraySimple') {
  5761. 5761                         $p = array_shift($parameters);
  5762. 5762                         $this->debug('calling serializeType w/indexed param');
  5763. 5763                         $xml .= $this->serializeType($name, $type, $p, $use, $enc_style);
  5764. 5764                     } elseif (isset($parameters[$name])) {
  5765. 5765                         $this->debug('calling serializeType w/named param');
  5766. 5766                         $xml .= $this->serializeType($name, $type, $parameters[$name], $use, $enc_style);
  5767. 5767                     } else {
  5768. 5768                         // TODO: only send nillable
  5769. 5769                         $this->debug('calling serializeType w/null param');
  5770. 5770                         $xml .= $this->serializeType($name, $type, null, $use, $enc_style);
  5771. 5771                     }
  5772. 5772                 }
  5773. 5773             } else {
  5774. 5774                 $this->debug('no parameters passed.');
  5775. 5775             }
  5776. 5776         }
  5777. 5777         $this->debug("serializeRPCParameters returning: $xml");
  5778. 5778         return $xml;
  5779. 5779     } 
  5780. 5780     
  5781. 5781     /**
  5782. 5782      * serialize a PHP value according to a WSDL message definition
  5783. 5783      * 
  5784. 5784      * TODO
  5785. 5785      * - multi-ref serialization
  5786. 5786      * - validate PHP values against type definitions, return errors if invalid
  5787. 5787      * 
  5788. 5788      * @param string $operation operation name
  5789. 5789      * @param string $direction (input|output)
  5790. 5790      * @param mixed $parameters parameter value(s)
  5791. 5791      * @return mixed parameters serialized as XML or false on error (e.g. operation not found)
  5792. 5792      * @access public
  5793. 5793      * @deprecated
  5794. 5794      */
  5795. 5795     function serializeParameters($operation, $direction, $parameters)
  5796. 5796     {
  5797. 5797         $this->debug("in serializeParameters: operation=$operation, direction=$direction, XMLSchemaVersion=$this->XMLSchemaVersion"); 
  5798. 5798         $this->appendDebug('parameters=' . $this->varDump($parameters));
  5799. 5799         
  5800. 5800         if ($direction != 'input' && $direction != 'output') {
  5801. 5801             $this->debug('The value of the \$direction argument needs to be either "input" or "output"');
  5802. 5802             $this->setError('The value of the \$direction argument needs to be either "input" or "output"');
  5803. 5803             return false;
  5804. 5804         } 
  5805. 5805         if (!$opData = $this->getOperationData($operation)) {
  5806. 5806             $this->debug('Unable to retrieve WSDL data for operation: ' . $operation);
  5807. 5807             $this->setError('Unable to retrieve WSDL data for operation: ' . $operation);
  5808. 5808             return false;
  5809. 5809         }
  5810. 5810         $this->debug('opData:');
